A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney didn't hire the fanboys to write the backstory to our favorite characters. Boo! You can't have humor in a Star Wars movie. Boo! \nThis is a brilliant edition to the Star Wars canon. The fanboys have mostly lost their minds in speculation. This movie was brilliant because it didn't do what we all expected. It took us and it's characters on a journey that we didn't expect\, and could barely imagine. The baton has officially been passed.
